original_text: You shall rejoice in your feast, you and your son and your daughter, your male servant and your female servant, the Levite, the sojourner, the fatherless, and the widow who are within your towns.
korean_text: 절기를 지킬 때에는 너와 네 자녀와 노비와 네 성중에 거주하는 레위인과 객과 고아와 과부가 함께 즐거워하되

sentences.original_text: You shall rejoice in your feast
you and your son and your daughter
your male servant and your female servant
the Levite, the sojourner, the fatherless, and the widow
